name: Be the Present
description:
NOTE: X to talk/interact/advance in dialogue!!!

Description:
A submission for the Extra Credits Holiday Jam Desember 2018. The theme was "present". In this game you play the role of Emily and go out in the neighbourhood to spread some holiday cheer.

Credits: 
Unity Coding: dogiordano and Sindrex
Sound & Music: Vulpatrino
Writing: Amanda Hamilton
Art: Corvato
Miscellaneous: FatFat05 and I'M BATMAN

Tileset and character sprites by https://openpixelproject.itch.io/ (public domain).
